headline: Grid Expansion Accelerates in Southwest
summary: New infrastructure projects aim to boost energy resilience across California and Arizona.

headline: AI Models Reshape Forecasting for Renewables
summary: Machine learning tools are improving accuracy in solar and wind output predictions.

headline: EQT to Supply Natural Gas for Data Center Campus in Pennsylvania
summary: EQT Corporation will provide natural gas to power a new data center campus in Pennsylvania, marking a strategic intersection of energy infrastructure and digital expansion.

headline: Tesla Shuts Down Dojo Supercomputer
summary: Tesla ends its Dojo AI training project, pivoting to Nvidia chips and Samsung manufacturing. The move marks a strategic shift in AI infrastructure, with engineers launching DensityAI.
